title: Episode 6: Joe the Comedy, New Media and Tik Tok Sensation
description:
This episode I speak with my friend Joe about comedy, new media and the ethics of content creation. 

Follow Joe here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOZ7BYMpLfoRAaOOaW9sVg
